Get to know me.

My name is Levi Porter and I'm a digital strategist and front-end web designer and developer. I have been working in marketing - mostly as a freelancer - for a couple years. I've always had an interest in how things are made but it's only recently that I decided to learn how to build websites.

Last year, I traded in the palm trees and sunshine of Florida for the palm trees and sunshine of Hawaii. When I'm not working, I like to play soccer and listen to podcasts. I also have a pretty serious Spotify addiction and you can check out what I'm listening to.

Get in touch via email or Twitter.

I'm currently looking for full-time work in Honolulu. If you're interested in working together shoot me a message.

hello@levibrooke.com
